title: The TRUTH About Fantasy QBs: Part 1 + Wild Card Reactions - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/18
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back to deliver THE TRUTH! On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s a deep dive into the top fantasy quarterbacks from the 2021 season. Consistency ranks, boom/bust performances, and tons more! Plus, reactions to Wild Card Weekend and the latest NFL News. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 18th, 2022.
  
 (03:05) - Wild Card Weekend Reactions
 (12:20) - NFL News
 (29:25) - The TRUTH About Fantasy QBs
 (32:45) - Josh Allen
 (37:30) - Justin Herbert
 (40:45) - Tom Brady
 (43:20) - Patrick Mahomes
 (47:55) - Matthew Stafford
 (51:30) - Aaron Rodgers
 (54:10) - Dak Prescott
 (58:35) - Joe Burrow
 (01:05:45) - Kyler Murray(01:09:00) - Jalen Hurts
